original: @195b # // ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @195b # // ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: rang nyid ku ru kuller bsgom //
analyzed: rang nyid ku ru kuller bsgom //

original: sgrol ma las byung mtsho skyes ma //
analyzed: sgrol ma las byung mtsho skyes ma //
translated: Born from Tara, the Lake-born One,

original: bsgrub bya nang du gzhug byas nas //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nang du gzhug byas nas //
translated: having caused the victim to enter within,

original: 'dod pas myos par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pas myos par bsgom par bya //
translated: meditate on him as being intoxicated with desire.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i chu skyes las //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i chu skyes las //
translated: On the lotus of the Knowledge Being

original: dmar 'dzin de yi spyi bor bsam //
analyzed: dmar 'dzin de yi spyi bor bsam //

original: zhag bdun thun mtshams gsum bsgom na //
analyzed: zhag bdun thun mtshams gsum bsgom na //
translated: If you meditate for seven days in three sessions,

original: de ni ltung bar byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni ltung bar byed par 'gyur //
translated: he will fall under your control.

original: ku ru kulle'i dbang du byed pa'i man ngag go//
analyzed: ku ru kulle'i dbang du byed pa'i man ngag go//
translated: The esoteric instruction for bringing Kurukulla under your control.
